text: Cure For Pain was the second album released by the band Morphine. It was put out on the Rykodisc label in 1993. The tracks "Sheila" and "In Spite of Me" were part of the soundtrack of the 1994 independent movie Spanking the Monkey. == Track listing == # "Dawna" - 0:44 ^ # "Buena" - 3:19 # "I'm Free Now" - 3:24 # "All Wrong" - 3:40 # "Candy" - 3:14 # "A Head With Wings" - 3:39 # "In Spite of Me" - 2:34 ^ # "Thursday" - 3:26 # "Cure for Pain" - 3:13 # "Mary Won't You Call My Name?" - 2:29 # "Let's Take a Trip Together" - 2:59 ^ # "Sheila" - 2:49 Category:1993 albums
title: Cure for Pain
